title: The Mega Man X Dive Mobile And PC Game Getting An Official Complete Works Art Book
description: While Mega Man games might vary in gameplay quality, every entry in the series has superb art. Take Mega Man X Dive, for example, which started a smartphone game before jumping to Steam in 2023. While you might expect a mobile spinoff to cut corners, its art direction is just as strong as any other game starring the Blue Bomber, and its nature as a cross-over title means it's packed with awesome-looking characters and remixed designs from across the entire franchise. If you'd like to see the hard work of the illustrators and designers who helped bring it to life, you can preorder the Mega Man X Dive: Official Complete Works book for $50 ahead of its release on March 25, 2025.Mega Man X Dive: Official Complete Works$50This is a 256-page hardcover book that contains character designs, rough concepts, key art, and plenty of creator commentary. There's even a series of interviews with the developers, so you can find out how characters X, Zero, and Axl were designed for the leap to mobile, alongside newcomers like RiCO, iCO, and ViA. The English cover hasn't been released, but since Udon is publishing this, it's highly likely that it'll be the same as the Japanese edition.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: All the Walmart Exclusive Steelbook Blu-Rays You Can Buy Now
description: With the ascendancy of streaming services seemingly on the wane thanks to tons of different channels, frustrating and ever-changing licensing deals, and the tendency of corporate masters to just delete shows and movies without fanfare, physical media is seeing a resurgence. And if you're into buying Blu-rays to preserve your favorite pieces of entertainment, you're likely to want some packages that look good--like Steelbook cases that stand up to wear and tear a little better than the usual plastic, and often have a cooler look to boot.A lot of movies have a lot of Steelbook editions, but Walmart has lately taken to procuring its own exclusive packages, offering cover art and interior features you can't get anywhere else. In fact, Walmart now offers a huge number of Steelbook Blu-ray editions you can't get anywhere else, covering both standard Blu-rays and 4K Blu-rays.Below, we've compiled some of the very best of the exclusive Steelbook Blu-rays and 4K Blu-rays you can grab at Walmart, including several that are available for preorder. title: Kraven the Hunter Opening 7 Minutes Revealed as Director Teases the Inclusion of More Marvel Characters
description: Kraven the Hunter director J.C. Chandor took the stage to reveal the first seven minutes of the upcoming Marvel villain film starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, part of an NYCC 2024 showcase featuring Sony's upcoming slate of films. Venom star Tom Hardy also talked about the end of the trilogy and responded to the possibility of his Venom taking on Spider-Man.

description: With the first anniversary of Spider-Man 2's PS5 release just days away, developer Insomniac has announced the acclaimed superhero sequel will launch for PC on 30th January next year. Read more

title: Subnautica 2 launching with multiplayer and "several biomes", but early access will last "2 to 3 years"
description: Following yesterday's first proper Subnautica 2 reveal, developer Unknown Worlds has given some early hints at what players can expect when the underwater survival adventure launches into early access next year. Multiplayer support and "several biomes" will feature on day one, but there's plenty of time to evolve given early access is expected to last "about 2 to 3 years." Read more

Thatâ€™s why he announced to investors in 2023 that [â€¦]
author: Charlie Hall

title: Deadlock is an adrenaline soaked successor to the brawls of Dota 2 - get it away from me
description: Deadlock gives me the shakes. Valve's not-so-secret third-person MOBA shooter is a fiercely competitive game of push and pull through monster-peppered city streets. You'll get into hectic scrapes with a giant blob man and come out of it sweating and swearing, and possibly alive. It is tactical, deep, instinctive, and an interesting work-in-progress. It elicits adrenaline almost as much as it forces murder economics down your piehole. This is the kind of game that puts you into a blistering, exciting (and confusing) battle for survival, then displays a graph when you lose. I need to get as far away from it as possible. Read more
author: Brendan Caldwell

title: Create cutesy fire hazards in socket management puzzler Plug It In
description: Deep beneath my desk lies a secret shame: impenetrable black thickets of power leads, sprouting forth across two overlapping extension units. Such a failure of cable management pierces my conscience like the beat of Poe's tell-tale heart, and yet Iâ€™m forever powerless â€“ as in, I canâ€™t be bothered â€“ to do anything about it. Yet even I was soothed by the Steam Next Fest demo for Plug It In, a chilled-out puzzle game about clicking chunky plugs into the right outlets. Read more
